::Neody::

Neody looks at the repaired base. It was actually pretty good. He 
walks over to Ramjet and Cygnar, waiting for anything to do.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::The Destrocons/Falcon/Snare:::
> 
> ::The repairs were finally complete, and all of my Destrons look at 
it in 
> awe::
> Falcon: I've never seen the Neocon base in such good condition!
> Skywarp: Yep.
> ::Ramjet walks over to Cygnar::
> Ramjet: Cygnar, ive been looking at maps of this planet, and we are 
in a 
> strategic location.
> ::He brings up a holo map::
> Ramjet: Our base is reasonably close to this base
> ::he points at the Blackfortress::
> Ramjet: And extremely close to this one.
> ::he points to the Trainer base::
> Ramjet: I need help deciding what should be done with these two 
groups-- 
> destroy, or help. Since you are the strategic mind around here, i 
thought you 
> might know.
